name: Zoryas
description: Zoryas are medium celestial beings that embody the principles of light and order, showcasing elegant features that reflect their magical nature.
memorable: They possess the unique ability to open celestial gates that provide both power and peril, becoming unconscious for days afterward.
goals: To uphold justice, assist those in need, and intervene in mortal affairs.
relations: Often associated with other celestial beings, divine entities, and celestial planes.
environment: Typically found in areas of significance to celestial beings, such as holy sites or places of great importance.
strengths: They regenerate health every turn, resist fire and radiant damage, and are immune to several debilitating conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to necrotic damage, which disrupts their regeneration.
attacks: Utilizes magical weapon attacks that deal additional radiant or fire damage, alongside powerful area effects of light and darkness.
most_powerful_ability: Open Celestial Gate, allowing the creation of a portal to the celestial plane at a great personal cost.
senses: Truesight up to 60 feet allows them to see through illusions and detect hidden entities.
skills: Proficient in insight and perception, showcasing remarkable awareness and understanding of their surroundings.
additional_information: Regenerates 10 hit points at the start of its turn if not struck by necrotic damage.
Can create areas of bright light that blind enemies and disrupt magical effects.
Capable of manipulating darkness to control battlefield visibility and inflict damage.
Proficient in Charisma saving throws, making them resilient against magical effects.
Possesses telepathy that extends to 120 feet for communication.
test_queries: celestial being that uses light and darkness
guardian of justice from celestial realms
